ValidationRule.description: Makes the Sungard field required for Service Support 401k/S125
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(Sungard__c = '', RecordType.Name = 'Service Support 401k/S125 Case', NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name , "System Administrator")), OR( OR(TEXT( Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Manual Asset Transfer', TEXT( Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Distribution Manual Trade (LDPS Use Only)', TEXT( Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Fee Manual Trade', TEXT( Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Manual Trade'),
AND(TEXT( Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Loan', OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Apply Loan Payment', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Sungard Loan Update', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Process Manual Loan (LDPS Only)', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Residual Loan Payoff')),
AND(TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Participant Level Change - 401k', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'SSN Merge (Sungard)'),
AND(TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Residuals', OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Backdating SG (Recon)', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c)= 'Trade Date Needed / 957 Edit')),
AND(TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Clear Residuals', OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Case Change Residuals', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Fund Change Residuals', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Other', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Plan Liquidation Residuals')),
AND(TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Sungard', OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = '5500 Research', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Dividend', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'General Research', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Rate of Return is 0')),
AND(TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Sungard Loan Update', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Conversion Loan Update'),
AND(TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Loan', OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Loan Reamortization', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Reverse Loan Default', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Sell Out Loan Fund')),
TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'SSN Merge (Sungard)',
OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Case Change Residuals', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Fund Change Residuals', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Other', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'Plan Liquidation Residuals'),
AND( TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Sungard', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Research (No Trade)', TEXT(Reassign_Category_3__c) = 'General Research'),
AND( TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Loan', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Status'),
AND( TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Loan', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Trade Loan Payment'),
AND(OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = '5500', OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'RRS'), TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Multiple Client (+10) Issue', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Ticket Manage/Monitor', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'No Form Created')),
AND(TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Enrollment - 401k', OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Auto Enrollment', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Monthly Enrollment Communication')),
OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Fee Disclosure', TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Guided Choice', TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Unresponsive Plans'),
AND(TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = '401k Quarter End Packages', OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Multiple Client (+10) Issue', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Ticket Manage/Monitor', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Auto Allocation Opt Out')),
AND(TEXT(Reassign_Category_1__c) = 'Website', OR(TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Employee Website Issue', TEXT(Reassign_Category_2__c) = 'Employer Website Issue'))
) )
